title: Saintess
description: In a world where steam and sorcery collide, you are chosen as the Saint Maiden, a beacon of hope thrust into a decadent cathedral dripping with secrets. Tasked by a desperate goddess, you’ll navigate a realm of towering locomotives and glowing lanterns, unraveling divine mysteries amid a tangle of steel and magic. Customize your sacred form—youthful innocence or voluptuous allure—and wield miraculous powers, from angelic transformations to holy miracles, as you confront corruption head-on. Every choice binds you tighter to a fate where ecstasy and peril entwine, offering no escape but surrender or sacrifice. Will you purify the darkness or let it consume you in this haunting, steampunk odyssey?
author: Lekah, Dragon's Whore (DLC + Translation)
